summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending the Zoning Ordinance (86300) by adding a new article 21A to integrate as part of the Zoning Ordinance the regulatory portion of the Shoreline Master Program approved by the State Department of Ecology, and by adding a new Section 30.1 to provide for the issuance of regulatory orders.
note: 102 35mm maps (52 microfiches); Shoreline Master Program environmental classification maps.
